channel.title: Just sort it out!
channel.description:
:mad: all 5 servers i use are down!! :mad: what the hell is wrong with this how can all 5 of the ones i use happen to be down at the same time- all the other games are laggy and badly made the only good ones are "down" so what the hell is happening, they've all been offline for ages:
70.176.67.241
81.156.76.113
82.4.173.81
shadowscape2007.servegame.com
frugooscape.net
somone get them working, moderators and owners are supposed to make sure the game is running well and nothings going wrong and youve made a jolly good job out of that-about 10 servers offline and 6 with lag.

item.title: Just sort it out!
item.dc:creator: @Newbi Newbi
item.description:
@Newbi wrote:

This doesn’t belong here sir, look for IP’s in server advertisement, we can’t help it if other people’s servers are down so don’t blow your steam on us. If you get so frustrated with other peoples servers. make your own.

Read full topic

item.title: Just sort it out!
item.dc:creator: @simonh777 simonh777
item.description:
@simonh777 wrote:

getnscape is pathetic- people can attack anyone, everything is weird[br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 08:18:08 AM[/size][hr]peewee and spazscape are also both down…[br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 08:20:33 AM[/size][hr]jesus christ can someone just get ONE server up and running, just ONE![br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 08:26:59 AM[/size][hr]!!!1

Read full topic

item.title: Just sort it out!
item.dc:creator: @brownieman brownieman
item.description:
@brownieman wrote:

getnscape.no-ip.org is online

Read full topic
